display_name: Overall RDI at 5% desat or arousal
description: RDI at 5% desat or arousal  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas associated with arousal or >= 5% desat) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: rdi5pa = 60*(hremba5 +hroa5 + hnrba5 + hnroa5 +carba5+ caroa5 + canba5 + canoa5 +oarba5 +oaroa5 + oanba5 +oanoa5) / slpprdp

hybrid.LABEL: Calculated - Overall RDI at 5% desat or arousal
